Vendors & Delivery Partners

We collaborate with trusted vendors, consulting firms and independent partners to support client needs, niche skills and larger programs of work.

Submit a Proposal Respond to an RFP / RFQ

Who We Work With

Staffing & Recruiting Firms

Regional and specialized firms who can support overflow roles or niche skill sets.

Consulting & Services Companies

Project-based partners with capabilities in technology, operations and transformation.

Independent Experts

Subject matter experts and solo consultants for specific domains and initiatives.

How We Work With Vendors

Our goal is to keep partnership simple, transparent and aligned with client expectations.

  1. Share your capabilities – Tell us about your focus areas, locations and strengths.
  2. Alignment & agreement – We align on terms, working model and types of requests.
  3. Role distribution – You receive well-defined requirements with clear timelines.
  4. Submission & feedback – We provide timely feedback on profiles and next steps.
  5. Ongoing relationship – Regular communication to refine focus and grow together.

Get Started as a Vendor

If you are interested in partnering with HudsonPrairie, start by submitting a brief overview of your services, coverage areas and typical profiles.

Helpful information to include:

  • Primary industries and technologies you support
  • Geographic focus (remote, on-site, specific regions)
  • Typical roles and levels (junior, mid, senior, leadership)
  • Engagement models and capacity for new work
